pages.text: Greetings. You may refer to me, the writer of this book, as $(#0000ff)Luna$(). I wrote this book as a sort of "personal journal" to archive my experiences in this world, and to preserve the history of this land.

This is actually a copy of my journal, and holds similar powers to other ender-powered objects. As you find noteworthy items, I will write about them in my journal and the pages should magically appear in your copy.
